headline: Oxea Appoints Ed Ray as Chief Financial Officer
summary: MONHEIM AM RHEIN, Germany, August 04, 2025--Oxea appoints Ed Ray as its new CFO, effective Aug. 18, 2025, to drive sustainable growth and global financial strategy.

headline: Green Water Treatment Chemicals Company Evaluation Report, with Leading Companies Kemira, Veolia, and Ecolab
summary: The Green Water Treatment Chemicals Companies Quadrant provides a detailed industry analysis of the global green water treatment chemicals market, spotlighting key players and trends. This comprehensive report reviews over 100 companies, identifying the Top 10 leaders in eco-conscious water purification solutions. Leading firms like Kemira, Veolia, and Ecolab drive market innovation and sustainability through strategic investments and partnerships. The report evaluates companies based on their p
